p: The Bayesian phylogenetic tree was generated using TOPALi v2.5 (Milne etÂ al. 2009) based on the complete chloroplast genome of B. stariata and 24 other species from Orchiidaceae and Epidendroideae. Further, the phylogenetic tree analysis showed that B. stariata was closely related to the genus Bletilla formosana ( Figure 1).
